content:
| Aspect | Lamborghini |
| --- | --- |
| Localization strategy | Adapts products and messaging to local markets |
| Teams | In-house localization team and external vendors |
| TMS | SDL Trados, Wordbee, Memsource |
| MT | Custom MT engine for specific language pairs |
| TM | In-house TM for specific content types |
| API | Available for integrating translation processes |
| CMS Integration | Integration with Adobe Experience Manager, WordPress, etc. |
| Security | Compliance with data protection laws and GDPR |
| Standards and guidelines | Adherence to brand guidelines and industry standards |
| I18N tools | Unicode compliance, support for RTL languages |
| Methods/models | Agile methodology, continuous localization |
| Workflows | Collaborative translation, multistep review process |
| TMS customization | Customization for specific workflows and use cases |
| Technics | Use of CAT tools, translation memory, and glossaries |
| Reporting and analytics | Detailed reporting and analysis of translation processes |
| Vendors | Use of external vendors for specific language expertise |
| Reviews/LQA | Multistep review process with in-country reviewers |
| Scalability | Able to handle large volumes of translation |
| User friendliness | User-friendly CAT tools and translation platforms |
| Cost | High cost due to luxury brand positioning |
| User/license limits | No specific limits on user or license |
| Collaboration | Collaborative translation process with internal teams |
| Support | Technical support for CAT tools and translation platforms |
| Supported content types | Product descriptions, marketing materials, website content |
| Roles and permissions | Controlled access to translation and review processes |
